lead_paragraph: Johnny Manziel has been suspended for the first four games of next season for violating the NFL's substance-abuse policy, and the free agent quarterback could face further discipline over his domestic violence case if he signs with another team.

headline.print_headline: Manziel Suspended 4 Games Over NFL's Substance-Abuse Policy
headline.main: Manziel Suspended 4 Games Over NFL's Substance-Abuse Policy
